review: I was on the fence about cutting to cable cord but I am beyond happy with my purchase of the Fire Tv Stick and the apps for watching shows and movies. I haven't even scratched the surface of all that it offers and I am thrilled with it. The initial set up is so easy a child could do it, and I love the remote..
author: Catherine Dana

review: This device is awesome!  Its amazing how much content is available.  We just cut our satellite services and I am completely amazed by the Amazon Fire TV Stick.  I only wish I would have bought it sooner.

review: Good product based on the price.  The only issue I have is that Netflix takes a while to load or will not load at all.  It may have been that Netflix was busy that night with lots of people watching. However other programs such as hula worked perfectly.  Also the picture doesn't seem to be as clear as when I use my apple TV. But again, you can't beat the price.
